You sigh as you look at your algebra book. This is the second final year that you were having in highschool. The text level is still the same and you realize that this is just making you mad thinking about it. The day that you were suposed to graduate, your mom decides to volunteer you for the latest program in schooling. It is called Learners revival. The program makes you attend whatever school you went to for the second time. Your mother said that you would do it to make up for the bad grades you got freshman year. You snort at that memory.
         Just then your hugest crush walks by. You think that that if she wasn't here, you would already have left for another town. You notice that she is looking at you funny and you start to feel your face burning. You quickly get your books and head to your car.
         The girls in your class all cing to you like monkeys but you don't even have the guts to ask your crush out! , you think to yourself. After 4 years you had grown alot. You went from being the short son of your father, to the tall and "rugged stud" that drives the girls wild. The only thing that sets you apart from all of the other "big boys" in the class is your tail. Your tail has grown from to embarassing to rediculously long. While you are over 8' tall, your tail has reached 19' long. You have already been called long tail but this is just rediculous. You trained yourself to be able to stand on your tail so you could not be intimidated by larger people, but if your did that trick you would be intimidating to all of the people of the world. The up side to having such a long tail is the fact that your powers can be focused through it, Your powers have grown too. You have the ability to use a shield made out of the shadows and your manipulation has gotten to the point where you can lift people up with it.
         All of the girls in your class try to get your attention, but they just manage to get you even more shy. You were surprized at the fact that your powers did not affect your personality. the only major change was that you now have actually written a world famous horror story. Nobody actually knows that you did this because you used a pen name and you gave no information about yourself. You constantly are worried that someone will find out though.

112.content:
You are a Lioness Anthro called Bello Blue (Though most people call you Blue for short)

You got your name from your unusual fur color, most lions are tawny gold but you were born a bright sky blue, You were teased and ridiculed by all your Anthro classmates It. Had. To Stop.

One day you decide you can't take it anymore and run away from home, you pack all your things in your backpack and wander into the deep woods in search of someone who will except you.

After a while you feel a bit hungry and thirsty, you notice a stream of cool water, you kneel down and lap it up.

Above you you see branches laden with apples! While you are normally carnivorous you're hungry enough to eat anything at this point, you happily gorge yourself on apples

After your meal you see...

1121.content:
You see a dark cave, but also you hear something...it sounds like...crying.

You muster your courage and head to the dark cave, someone might be in trouble and need your help.

In the cave it is to dark to see anything, even your sensitive feline eyes can't detect any light. But the sound of the crying gets closer...finally you smell something with your sensitive Anthro nose a smell you have never smelled before.

You bump into someone or something...You quickly realize it is a someone when the thing you bumped into says "Ouch!"

"Who...Who are you?" You ask

"I'm Mort." Says a voice like it belongs to a teenage boy "Who are you?"

"I'm Bello Blue." You say "But you can just call me Blue."

"That's a funny name." Mort says

"Can't be any funnier then Mort." You say, you start sniffing the strange creature all over as is typical of Anthros when they meet.

"What are you doing?" Mort asked

"Don't you know it's polite for Anthros to sniff each other when they first meet?"

"I'm not an Anthro." Mort says "I'm a..."
1121.title: A Dark Cave

11212.content:
"Human?" You cock one of your ears, it sounded familiar but you couldn't think where.

"What...are you." Mort said a little fearfully

"I'm a Lioness." You said

"A lioness!" You swear you could hear Mort's voice cracking in the darkness.

"Is there something wrong with that?" You ask innocently

"I thought...Nevermind..." Mort says

"Go on..." You say

"I thought Lions were big scary monsters who ate humans..." Mort says in barely a whisper

Just then you remember something your mother told you about Humans, Humans and nasty, scary hairless apes who like to kill Anthros.

"Nevermind." You say turning to the exit of the cave "I'm sorry I even spoke to you?"

"Your leaving?" Mort says

"Yeah." You say "My Mama told me never talk to humans!"

"Please don't go!" Mort says almost tearfully "Your the only one who has ever said a kind word to me!"

"Why should I?" You ask

"Because..." Mort begins to cry now "No one in my village will come near me! They think I'm bad luck!"

"Bad luck?" You mutter "I've never heard of such a thing in my life."

"Please Blue!" Mort begs let me stay with you.

You don't say anything, but you head for the exit of the cave,Mort follows you, you don't say anything to him, but you don't rebuke him either...

When the two of you come out of the cave
11212.title: Mort the Human

112122.content:
When you come out of the cave you smell something burning, you look over the tops of the trees and you see smoke coming from your village

"No! No!" You shout "Mama! Papa!"

You run as fast as you can, not once thinking of the danger to yourself, you stop and you can't believe your eyes

The entire town is up in smoke! The Village you grew up in now burning to the ground!

You fall to your knees and begin to cry. Just then something bumps into you

An Old Fox with white fur falls over you

"Ah! My Ankle!" The Old Fox says clutching his ankle

"Oh! Grandfather Fox!" You say "Thank goodness you are not dead! Hang on let me go get you some water."

"It's no good Lion Cub." The Old Fox says "I'm done for...My heart is giving out I can feel it!"

You get down on your knees and grab the old Fox's paw

"Is there anything I can do?" You ask

"I will give you the means to avenge my death." He said "I am the last of the Great Anthro Wizards...I have great magic beyond your wildest dreams...You must promise that you will only use these powers for good, never for evil."

"I promise." Is all you can say

"Good. Hold on tight to my paw, I will transfer my powers to you through skin contact."

You feel a warm pleasant feeling in your paw, it lasts for several minutes then the old fox dies.

You see something come out of the bushes...It is...
112122.title: Smoke on the Water

1121221.content:
Mort comes through the bushes, you get a good look at him now, he has pale skin and brown hair, he has brown eyes and wears glasses. His clothes are a green shirt and blue pants

"What....Happened?" He pants

"That's what happened!" You say gesturing toward the ruins of your hometown "My entire village is up in smoke! They are right about you! You are bad luck!"

"Please don't say that!" Mort says tearfully

"Why shouldn't I?" You ask "I meet you and my town catches fire!"

"Maybe it was all a coincidence!" Mort says "Maybe someone was smoking in bed!"

"Anthros don't smoke!" You say bluntly

"Please!" Mort says "Just give me another chance."

You think for a moment
1121221.title: Mort

This story is the Tales of loss. basically you are one of the three races anthro (reptile, animals etc that are a lot more like human than reptile ie walk on 2 legs, reasonable hight, able to talk intelegently ect) dragon or human. The path you choose will bring you closer to the truth but i warn you you will have to have at least evidence of a concience to get to the end of the story without dying.
Please let me decide when to finish the story (If I decide) so please do not write dead ends. you can have end situations such as being eternally lost ect but at least have a nother option that can continue. no swearing unless you censor yourself but crap and variations of frick can be had if you don't over do it. No blood and guts gore. Keep it PG 13 people.
feel free to go out and have fun but be warned, your destiny can go 2 ways. chose wisely and you will live. fail to do so and your existence may never be recognized. Go out and find your path.
all right since no one wants to add i will state the reason for the title. Tales of loss is called that because each character gains great power at great costs. I will edit or ask people to edit chapters if the loss is not proportional.
